sentences.sContent: Such company and withstand of administrative mechanism ability are the most captious the test with the most mature American capital market.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such company and withstand of administrative mechanism ability are the most captious the test with the most mature American capital market.
sentences.sCn: 这样的公司和治理机制才能经得起最挑剔和最成熟的美国资本市场的考验。

remMethod.val: capt (拿) + ious → 拿 (别人的缺点) → 吹毛求疵的

trans.tranOther: apt to make trivial criticisms; fault-finding; carping
